name: E13B Letterforms (Freebie)
description:
Anyone ever wondered about that monospace-looking font along the bottom of US checks? 


Never heard of "checks", you say? Well, we won't go into that right now...


Anyways, I wanted the font for a fun project I was working on. Decided to make the letterforms. Maybe some of you need this too? Probably not, but here it is ready to go!


Colors and style of design a tribute to Simple Bank's checks. RIP.
